description:
RedLaser – Barcode Scanner, Shopping assistant & QR Code Reader

 “Top 10 Must Have App for your iPhone” ― The New York Times
 “If you haven’t downloaded it, it should be on your iPhone.”― The Today Show
 
Rated as a top shopping app by The New York Times, The Today Show, Fortune Magazine, Time Magazine and CNN Money, RedLaser helps millions of shoppers shop smarter every day - and it can help you too! 

Never overpay again – RedLaser helps you find the best prices, coupons, and deals for all your favorite products and stores, online and locally.  

•GET THE BEST PRICE 
Scan a barcode or search to find the best price, online or locally

•SEARCH FOR PRODUCTS, STORES AND DEALS
Search for products, coupons, deals, and nearby locations of your favorite stores.
 
•INFORMATION THAT HELPS YOU SHOP 
Read reviews, see nutrition facts, and find store locations, store hours, and in-store maps. 

•NEVER MISS OUT ON A GOOD DEAL WHEN IN A STORE 
Open RedLaser in a store and find everything you need to save: coupons, weekly circulars, store maps.  

•DISCOVER NEW PRODUCTS 
Find alternatives and accessories for the product you just viewed, and see what other RedLaser users have searched

•DIGITIZE YOUR WALLET
Scan & store your loyalty cards and even share cards with family and friends


● FEATURES ●

► Scan all major retail barcodes (including UPC and QR codes)
► Search our database of millions of products, stores, and deals
► Compare prices and find the best deals and coupons for thousands of online and local retailers
►When in a store, get everything you need to shop and save at your fingertips – hours, store maps, coupons, deals, weekly circulars, and more 
► Read product reviews and nutritional info to help you make the right decision
► View popular products scanned by other RedLaser users. 
►Securely back up your history, loyalty cards and favorites in your RedLaser account
► Create QR codes from contact info, URLs, a location, and more with our powerful QR code engine
► Create shopping, wish, and gift lists to share with friends and family.  Also great for archiving your book, CD, DVD, and even your wine collection!

 
● Coverage ●
 
Featured as a top comparison shopping app by E! News, Better Homes & Gardens, The Oprah Magazine and All You.
 
Top five comparison shopping app by Smart Money magazine, as featured on CBS news
 
PC Magazine’s ten best shopping apps to compare prices 
 
Named as an 'Essential App' for CNN Money's 'Top 35 Money Apps: Shopping'

Featured in Marie Claire as an app you must download! Online article titled "The Rich Girl's Money Rules to Live By." 

"Any iPhone users shopping this weekend should be armed with RedLaser."
― USA Today
 
"...RedLaser is a perfect shopping companion."
― The New York Times

“I've loved RedLaser since it cost $1.99; it's still one of my favorite free apps and one of the few that actually saves me money. Scan the bar code of almost anything with your iPhone/iPad/iPod touch; RedLaser searches the Web for the item's price at thousands of online retailers as well as nearby brick-and-mortar stores. If you don't have RedLaser, what are you waiting for?”
- Dr. Mac, Houston Chronicle
 
► ATTRIBUTION: RedLaser uses three separate algorithms for recognizing barcodes. One is part of the ZXing Project: http://bit.ly/zxproj which is licensed under the Apache 2.0 License. Full: http://bit.ly/a2license
